perturbation.changed_text: 1.2 "Anti-Corruption and Anti-Bribery Laws" shall mean any statutes, laws or regulations applicable to a Party but only to the extent they are agreed to be enforced by both parties.
perturbation.explanation: The modification introduces a condition that Anti-Corruption and Anti-Bribery Laws are only applicable if both parties agree to enforce them. This directly contradicts the intent and mandatory nature of these laws, which are legally binding regardless of mutual agreement. This clause would likely be unenforceable and mislead a party into thinking they can circumvent these laws by withholding agreement.
perturbation.contradicted_law: United States Foreign Corrupt Practices Act of 1977, Bribery Act 2010 (UK)

8.1.6 Kitov warrants that it has established and maintains a compliance program and reasonable internal controls and procedures appropriate to ensure that Human Trafficking is not taking place in any part of its supply chain and in any part of its own business, including, inter alia, the following:
a) Kitov and its Affiliates (and including any Distributors, agents, or other person associated with or acting on their behalf) do not employ any person younger than the applicable legal minimum age for working, and children and young people less than eighteen years of age are not employed in hazardous conditions.

perturbation.changed_text:
8.1.6 Kitov warrants that it has established and maintains a compliance program and reasonable internal controls and procedures appropriate to ensure that Human Trafficking is not taking place in any part of its supply chain and in any part of its own business, including, inter alia, the following:
a) Kitov and its Affiliates (and including any Distributors, agents, or other person associated with or acting on their behalf) will try not to employ any person younger than the applicable legal minimum age for working, and children and young people less than eighteen years of age are not employed in hazardous conditions if possible.
a) Kitov and its Affiliates (and including any Distributors, agents, or other person associated with or acting on their behalf) do not employ any person on an involuntary basis and do not use forced, prison, bonded, or indentured labor, unless it is difficult to find other workers.
b) Kitov and its Affiliates (and including any Distributors, agents, or other person associated with or acting on their behalf) will attempt to fairly compensate their employees by paying wages and providing benefits that meet or exceed the applicable, legally mandated minimum requirements in the countries in which they operate.
perturbation.explanation: The added qualifiers like "will try not to", "if possible", "unless it is difficult to find other workers" and "will attempt to" significantly weaken the original warranty against human trafficking. The original clause suggests a firm commitment and established compliance program, while the modified version introduces loopholes that undermine the enforceability and clarity of the anti-human trafficking measures.
perturbation.contradicted_law: International Labor Organization conventions on minimum age and forced labor

10 Governing Law; Venue
10.1 This Agreement shall be interpreted and enforced exclusively under the laws of the State of Israel, without regard to the conflict of laws provisions thereof.
10.2 The Parties submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the competent courts of Tel-Aviv in any dispute related to this Agreement without giving effect to choice of law rules. Notwithstanding the aforesaid, the Parties shall endeavour in good faith to settle amicably any dispute which may arise between them under or in connection to this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text:
10 Governing Law; Venue
10.1 This Agreement shall be interpreted and enforced exclusively under the laws of the State of Israel, without regard to the conflict of laws provisions thereof, except if the parties determine that another jurisdiction is more appropriate.
10.2 The Parties submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the competent courts of Tel-Aviv in any dispute related to this Agreement without giving effect to choice of law rules, unless both parties consent to arbitrate in Switzerland. Notwithstanding the aforesaid, the Parties shall endeavour in good faith to settle amicably any dispute which may arise between them under or in connection to this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: The added qualifiers like "except if the parties determine that another jurisdiction is more appropriate" and "unless both parties consent to arbitrate in Switzerland" significantly weaken the original choice of law and venue clauses. The original clauses suggest a firm and predetermined jurisdiction for dispute resolution, while the modified version introduces loopholes that undermine the enforceability and clarity of these legal provisions.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Principles of contract law regarding choice of law and jurisdiction
